channel.title: New Seth Godin course for freelancers (with discount)
channel.description:
Seth's just posted a new course on Udemy, aimed at freelancers, but I reckon there's a ton of useful stuff for bootstrappers too..
https://www.udemy.com/seth-godin-freelancer-course/?couponCode=MOVEUP
Coupon code gets you 50% discount for a short while

item.title: New Seth Godin course for freelancers (with discount)

item.description:
Thanks for the heads up. I bought it and look forward to working through the course.

Read full topic

item.title: New Seth Godin course for freelancers (with discount)
item.dc:creator: rwillmer
item.description:
I did buy it, won’t have chance to look at it until the weekend though.

But I’m sure it will be good, I’m a huge fan of everything Seth Godin produces

(And if you don’t know about him, he’s made his “Startup School” podcast freely available at http://www.earwolf.com/show/startup-school/; well worth a listen)

Read full topic
